name: S3GetVersionInfo
description: Returns version information as a query for a specific object or bucket.

params.name: bucketName
params.description: Name of the bucket to get info for.

params.name: objectName
params.description: Name of the object (path) within the bucket to get info for. If not defined, info of the bucket is returned.

params.name: accessKeyId
params.description: S3 accessKeyId. If not defined, checks the system property/environment variable for [lucee.s3.accesskeyid].

params.name: secretAccessKey
params.description: S3 secretAccessKey. If not defined, checks the system property/environment variable for [lucee.s3.secretaccesskey].

params.name: host
params.description: The provider to connect to. If not set, Amazon AWS is used.
